main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted by Avenger Blue flight of the 5th Air Division over Parkersburg, W. Virginia on 18 December 1957.
interesting points: The object was tracked on radar for seven minutes and observed to have red blinking lights,The sighting occurred at approximately 6:00 PM on a clear night,The object was reported to be fast and behaved in an unusual manner,Several military personnel, including pilots, witnessed the sighting,Overall observation duration was around 20-30 minutes.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object with red blinking lights
location: Guthrie & 40 mi E of Parkersburg, W. Virginia, USA
witness description: military personnel including pilots from the 5th Air Division
